energy.usef.core.config

Class AbstractConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.config.AbstractConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Config, ConfigAgr, ConfigBrp, ConfigCro, ConfigDso, ConfigMdc, ConfigPbcFeeder

    public abstract class AbstractConfig
extends Object
    Abstract config file which can be used in every participant project.

      • getProperties

        public Properties getProperties()

      • findFile

        public InputStream findFile(String fullFileName,
                            String filenameOfTheList)
        Tries to find a file as a resource. A TechnicalException is thrown if it couldn't be found.
        Parameters:
        fullFileName - the full name where the file is located.
        filenameOfTheList - the name of the allow- or denylist.
        Returns:
        The InputStream representing the resource.

      • startConfigWatcher

        protected void startConfigWatcher()

      • stopConfigWatcher

        protected void stopConfigWatcher()

      • isConfigWatcherRunning

        public boolean isConfigWatcherRunning()
        The configuration watcher watches if a configuration file changes. If so, the properties file is loaded again and existing properties are overwritten.
        Returns:
        true if the configuration watcher is running.

      • getConfigurationFolder

        public static String getConfigurationFolder()
        Returns the configuration folder of the application or for unit tests.
        Returns:
        the configuration Folder

      • readProperties

        public void readProperties()
                    throws IOException
        Reads the configuration properties which consist of application specific properties which overrule default properties.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readDefaultProperties

        public Properties readDefaultProperties()
                                 throws IOException
        Reads the default properties from the classpath. Used for tests and also used to merge properties from a file.
        Returns:
        - The read properties, named localProperties within the scope of the method
        Throws:
        IOException
